name: Tea Time (Jensen Verlaan)
description:
"Brew unique tea recipes. Master pouring and measuring a variety of ingredients. Perfect the art of tea steeping."

Tea Time is a 2D, two-button, casual puzzle feature whose gameplay challenges the physical core player skills of precision, measurement, and timing - alongside puzzle-solving!

This feature was developed for the "Ubisoft Future Women in Games" Game Design competition, and was awarded 3rd place.
